page.title: 12New Housing
page.content: In 1984 nine new houses were built in Ingleton on Hillside Stack Yard and the same builders are starting to build 21 houses and bungalows behind { {Manor House}.Other new bungalows were built on the south side of the village. All the other villages in the area have stone built properties dating from the 1600's.No new properties are being built, except two are planned for Headlam, as the area is listed as a {Conservation Area}.Several houses in the area are being modernised. In contrast to these new houses there is {Killerby Hall}built 250 years ago and {Hilton Hall}built 800 years ago.
